metadata.feature_description: Bookmark and unbookmark articles for later reference

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki article 'Published Test Article - Jan 16 2026'
steps.expected: Article page loads with bookmark button visible
steps.actual: Article page loaded successfully with 'Bookmark this' button visible

steps.expected: Article is bookmarked, button changes to 'Remove bookmark', bookmark count increases
steps.actual: Button changed to 'Remove bookmark', sidebar bookmark count increased from (2) to (3)

steps.action: Click 'Remove bookmark' button on bookmarked article
steps.expected: Bookmark is removed, button changes back to 'Bookmark this', bookmark count decreases
steps.actual: Button changed back to 'Bookmark this', sidebar bookmark count decreased from (3) back to (2)

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki main page and locate bookmarks section in sidebar
steps.expected: Bookmarks section is visible showing count

steps.action: Click on 'Bookmarks (2)' in sidebar to view bookmarked articles list
steps.expected: A list of bookmarked articles is displayed
steps.actual: Clicking on 'Bookmarks (2)' did not navigate to a list view or display bookmarked articles. The click had no visible effect on the page.

steps.action: Navigate to Activity Feed page to look for bookmarks tab/section
steps.expected: Bookmarks tab or filter available in Activity Feed
steps.actual: Activity Feed has tabs for Activity Feed, Friends, Messages, and My Profile - no Bookmarks tab exists

issues: No UI element exists to view the list of bookmarked articles. The 'Bookmarks (X)' in the sidebar only displays a count and does not provide navigation to a list view.

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki article and bookmark it
steps.actual: Article bookmarked successfully, button shows 'Remove bookmark', Bookmarks count shows (3)

steps.action: Navigate back to the same Wiki article
steps.expected: Bookmark state should persist - button should show 'Remove bookmark' and count should still be (3)
steps.actual: Bookmark persisted successfully - button shows 'Remove bookmark' and Bookmarks count shows (3)

observations: Code review shows bookmarking does not award scoring points (0 reputation, 0 experience points) as defined in Mechanics.cs line 56
The bookmark functionality requires authentication (DnnAuthorize attribute) as shown in SocialController.cs
The 'Bookmarks (X)' counter in the sidebar only shows the count of bookmarked items but does not provide a link to view the actual list of bookmarked articles
No dedicated 'Bookmarks' tab or filter exists in the Wiki module listing page or Activity Feed page
The bookmark and unbookmark operations are logged as scoring actions (BookmarkedArticle and RemovedArticleBookmark) for activity tracking purposes
